sentence.Network_en: Polystyrene and polypropylene are the two plastic materials generally used for battery parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 聚苯乙烯和聚丙烯是一般用于电池部件的两种塑料.

sentence.Network_en: Hard elastic polypropylene is formed by crystallized under strain and annealing.
sentence.Network_cn: 硬弹性聚丙烯是在应变结晶和热结晶两个复合过程中形成的.

sentence.Network_en: The plastic housing, mostly polypropylene, contains lead electrodes and sulphuric acid.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分由聚丙烯制成的塑料外壳含有铅电极和硫酸.
